content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz
inventory=[{"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 60, "index": 14}, {"type": "cracked_nether_bricks", "quantity": 30, "index": 16}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 50, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "bookshelf", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 40}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a smooth quartz, I need to craft quartz blocks first. To craft a quartz block, I need to place 4 quartz side by side in the crafting table. To get quartz, I need to smelt nether quartz ore. Therefore, I will smelt the nether quartz ore at slot 35 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 35 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a smooth_quartz, I first need to craft a quartz_block. The only way to do that is to craft it from 4 quartz blocks, which can be obtained by smelting nether_quartz_ore. Therefore, I will start by smelting the nether_quartz_ore at slot 11 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 12 with quantity 1
